title: Cookies and Cream
description: She’s sexy, curvy, and the woman of my dreams.In the woods on her way to her grandmother’s house, she’s alone, a wolf stands in her way.Good thing I’m there. A real lumberjack to save the day.The sparks fly – I’m making her cookie mine. Now.first-time for heroineultimate mountain man herosuper steamylove-at-first sightwintry romancesmall town vibes
author: Frankie Love
